description: Smartwool's Men's Merino 250 Base Layer Colorblock Crew features 100% responsibly sourced Merino wool made with an interlock knit for enhanced comfort, breathability, thermoregulation, and odor resistance. With shoulder panels and a flatlock seam construction, this base layer brings consistent comfort, as well as reliable warmth and durability, to winter hiking, running, and skiing.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal Merino (250) Base Layer Colorblock Crew - Mens
